1.title: Angry Bird Versus the Defensive End
1.plot: Shawn and Antonio are in Florida bringing the grid iron players on the open salt water. NFL players Cameron Jordan and Mychal Kendricks will battle it out for the biggest fish. This Mychal's first time fishing, so if he loses" the big fish" bet, he can still claim victory over the hot grill with the best tasting meal.

2.title: Slow and Steady Wins the Race
2.plot: Meet Turks and Razor. Turks may seem quiet and unassuming but once he casts a line he is the one to keep your eye on. So many years in NY Rangers gear with the hustle and bustle on the ice he quickly dominates on the water.

3.title: Brotherly Love
3.plot: Retired NFL player Robert Gallery from the Oakland Raiders brings along his brother onto the Lake Ponchartrain. Will there be brotherly love when the grills get fired up?

4.title: The Saint and His Friend
4.plot: Mike Mauti from the New Orleans Saints brings along a friend to fish in his hometown stadium of Lake Catherine.

5.title: He Shoots He Snags
5.plot: Erik Gudbranson and Jesse Winchester from the National Hockey League's Florida Panthers will be fishing with Shawn and Antonio.

6.title: Pitching with the In-Laws
6.plot: Baltimore Orioles pitcher Chris Tillman competes against his father-in-law Greg Hellman, fishing in Islamorada, Florida U.S.A. The cooking competition will be judged by Greg's daughter aka, Chris's wife.

7.title: Cold Ice, Hot Chowder
7.plot: UFC fighters and brothers Dan and Jim Miller ice fish in a hut on frozen Lake Nipissing, Ontario, Canada.

8.title: Ultimate Fighters on Ice
8.plot: Dan and Jim Miller continue the competition on frozen Lake Nipissing, Ontario, Canada.

imdb.plot outline: Fish N Fire brings the energy of a chef and a fishing guide together on the open water and over a hot grill. At times they can agree to disagree, and other times they can act like grumpy old men. Chef Antonio is an award winning Canadian Chef with a passion for fishing, his flourishing business catering for movie sets (Total Recall, Robo Cop, Nikita, Pompeii) and their stars has seen him become one of the most sought after Chef's in the entertainment business. Fishing Guide Shawn Degagne is an extremely skilled pro fishing guide in Canada for over 20 years, an avid outdoorsman and former professional hockey player (drafted '97 - New York Rangers) until an injury kept him from playing. He guides for walleye, bass, perch, pike, and muskie in Canada. He has also fished all over North America for many different species of fish including Yellow Tail, Tuna, Mahi, Grouper, Sailfish and Tarpon. These guys each have special skills and they put those skills to the test on celebrity guests who come on the show to fish and then compete to make the best dish. Fish N Fire brings out the good and sometimes a little bit of the ugly from our guests and from our hosts when the competition starts to heat up.
